title: Clinical trial enrollment and consent
dataVerified: Participant name (coded), investigator, trial ID, consent details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: FDA regulatory compliance. Domain binding verifies trial sponsor. Prevents fabricated consent forms. Long retention requirement. Human subject protection. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
